ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Tech problem, any suggestions?
ygData.msgSnippet: WinME is an abomination that will hopefully be shortlived  This is a direct quote from one of my techie coworkers who plays everything in sight computer
ygData.messageBody:
"WinME is an abomination that will hopefully be shortlived" This is a
direct quote from one of my techie coworkers who plays everything in sight
computer game-wise. He's running Win2k now but not for EQ, that's still on
98.

Kit


As long as we're off-topic, though, anyone out there gaming on Win2k, and
which do you feel is better (for gaming): Win2k, WinME, or Win98?

Talies the Wanderer


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
